meanings.definition: Make corrections and revisions to a text.
meanings.sent1: I emendate my essay to fix any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She always emendates her emails before sending them out.
meanings.sent3: The teacher had to emendate the student's messy handwriting.
meanings.sent4: He carefully emendated the errors in the document.
meanings.sent5: Remember to emendate your work for accuracy.

meanings.sent1: We need to emendate the design to make it more user-friendly.
meanings.sent2: The chef emendated the recipe to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent3: I will emendate my outfit with a stylish accessory.
meanings.sent4: She emendated her speech to make it more persuasive.
meanings.sent5: Let's emendate our strategy for better results.
